fullText: Sarah Paulson delivers a powerhouse performance that anchors this revival, bringing both vulnerability and steely determination to Toni Lafayette as she navigates family secrets and moral reckonings.
dtliExcerpt: Sarah Paulson delivers a powerhouse performance that anchors this revival, bringing both vulnerability and steely determination to Toni Lafayette as she navigates family secrets and moral reckonings.

keyPhrases.quote: Sarah Paulson delivers a powerhouse performance

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: This excerpt only praises Paulson's performance while remaining silent on all other aspects of the production, suggesting the performance may be the sole redeeming element. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights a strong performance by Sarah Paulson, suggesting a solid recommendation for the revival. | Note: Models differed by 45 points.
